00056 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 |   PLT_EventSubscriber class
00058 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00063 class PLT_EventSubscriber
00064 {
00065 public:
00066     PLT_EventSubscriber(PLT_TaskManager* task_manager, 
00067                         PLT_Service*     service,
00068                         const char*      sid,
00069                         NPT_Timeout      timeout_secs = -1);
00070     ~PLT_EventSubscriber();
00071 
00072     PLT_Service*      GetService();
00073     NPT_Ordinal       GetEventKey();
00074     NPT_Result        SetEventKey(NPT_Ordinal value);
00075     NPT_SocketAddress GetLocalIf();
00076     NPT_Result        SetLocalIf(NPT_SocketAddress value);
00077     NPT_TimeStamp     GetExpirationTime();
00078     NPT_Result        SetTimeout(NPT_Timeout seconds = -1);
00079     const NPT_String& GetSID() const { return m_SID; }
00080     NPT_Result        FindCallbackURL(const char* callback_url);
00081     NPT_Result        AddCallbackURL(const char* callback_url);
00082     NPT_Result        Notify(NPT_List<PLT_StateVariable*>& vars);
00083     
00084 protected:
00085     //members
00086     PLT_TaskManager*          m_TaskManager;
00087     PLT_Service*              m_Service;
00088     NPT_Ordinal               m_EventKey;
00089     PLT_HttpClientSocketTask* m_SubscriberTask;
00090     NPT_String                m_SID;
00091     NPT_SocketAddress         m_LocalIf;
00092     NPT_Array<NPT_String>     m_CallbackURLs;
00093     NPT_TimeStamp             m_ExpirationTime;
00094 };

00096 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 |   PLT_EventSubscriberFinderBySID
00098 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00103 class PLT_EventSubscriberFinderBySID
00104 {
00105 public:
00106     // methods
00107     PLT_EventSubscriberFinderBySID(const char* sid) : m_SID(sid) {}
00108 
00109     bool operator()(PLT_EventSubscriber* const & sub) const {
00110         return m_SID.Compare(sub->GetSID(), true) ? false : true;
00111     }
00112 
00113 private:
00114     // members
00115     NPT_String m_SID;
00116 };
00117 
00118 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 |   PLT_EventSubscriberFinderByCallbackURL
00120 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00125 class PLT_EventSubscriberFinderByCallbackURL
00126 {
00127 public:
00128     // methods
00129     PLT_EventSubscriberFinderByCallbackURL(const char* callback_url) : 
00130       m_CallbackURL(callback_url) {}
00131 
00132     bool operator()(PLT_EventSubscriber* const & sub) const {
00133         return NPT_SUCCEEDED(sub->FindCallbackURL(m_CallbackURL));
00134     }
00135 
00136 private:
00137     // members
00138     NPT_String m_CallbackURL;
00139 };
00140

00153     virtual ~PLT_EventSubscriberFinderByService() {}
00154     bool operator()(PLT_EventSubscriber* const & eventSub) const;
00155 
00156 private:
00157     // members
00158     PLT_Service* m_Service;
00159 };
